body.name: O-Cedar Heavy Duty Corn Broom | Commercial-Grade Indoor and Outdoor Broom to Sweep & Clean Hard Floors| Sturdy Wooden Handle for Strength & Durability, Yellow, Black, 1 Count
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 37 mins
features: FOR INDOOR AND OUTDOOR USE: O-Cedar's Heavy Duty Corn Broom is perfect for both indoor and outdoor use, as this classic broom is strong and durable. Use it to sweep on all hard surfaces, such as the garage floor, driveway, patios, decks, sidewalk, tile floors, warehouses, and more!

HANDCRAFTED FOR DURABILITY: A sturdy and strong wooden handle, stiff wire-bound fibers, and five rows of reinforced-polytwine stitching provide this corn broom with long-lasting durability and strong bristles, so you can clean large dirt particles, leaves, or debris on wet or dry hard surfaces.

PROFESSIONAL-GRADE BROOM: 100% All-natural straw and fiber blend sweeps up both large and small particles to clean any hard floor surface. This broom is made from corn fibers, which is a natural renewable resource.

WORKS IN VARIETY OF ENVIRONMENTS: Our high-quality, heavy-duty broom is appropriate and sturdy enough for home, commercial, industrial, school, and office settings! The product dimensions are 56" x 8" x 2."
body.description: This O-Cedar Heavy Duty Corn Broom is made with 100% natural broom corn and is great for indoor and outdoor jobs. It is the perfect broom for sweeping the garage floor, driveways, patios, and decks. Our commercial-grade broom is effective in various environments, such as warehouses, schools, offices, home and more. Designed with wire-bound bristles, a solid wood handle, and 5 rows of polytwine stitching, this broom is built to last. It effectively sweeps up messes on everything from tile floors to garage floors, wet or dry. All natural straw and fiber blend sweeps up both large and small particles.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: TAKE THE STRESS OUT OF THE MESS Your home is your haven. O-Cedar's quality cleaning products keep your home looking and feeling great. For over a century, we’ve designed solutions that require less effort to provide a truly clean home. From our EasyWring Spin Mop to our ProMist MAX double-sided Microfiber Spray Mop, that remove dirt and grime with just water. Our innovative products have made it easier for people to maintain a clean, comfortable home.

EASIER CLEANING No matter the size of your home, the nature of the room, or how many four-legged friends reside with you, O-Cedar has the right mop, broom, or sponge for the right job. All of our products clean deeply and thoroughly, offering you and your loved ones a satisfying clean that you can feel and trust.

A CLEAN YOU CAN FEEL Clean requires action. But clean is also a feeling. One of comfort and satisfaction in a job well done, and also one of confidence—the kind that comes with knowing your home’s floors are the perfect spot for everything from playing to relaxing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The broom is heavy duty
reviews.reviewText: A heavy duty straw broomTo cleanly sweep all of your roomsThe handle is sturdyThe long straws are burly It won’t kick up dust in a plume.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I will start by saying that getting past the price was the biggest hurdle. It may be a case of you get what you pay for. This is an excellent broom no emperor’s new clothes! I frankly think it should be priced lower but after two months of regular use in my garage and general clean up I am very happy with the quality of the product and the performance of the broom as a clean sweep of areas that have dust and debris.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's flexible, soft, & an excellent sweeper
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this broom to use in the garage because of it's size and commercial rating but surprisingly discovered it is too soft for the garage. You cannot effectively jab it into corners and under work benchers, etc., but it excels at general sweeping for dust and debris and turned out to be excellent for our home with it's 100% downstairs and upstairs solid White Oak hardwood flooring. It's wide, soft, flexible, and excellent at sweepting dust, etc. Much better in the house than in the garage. I had also ordered the Weiler 44008 Corn Fiber Heavy-Duty Wire Banded Warehouse Broom with Wood Handle, 1-1/2" Head Width, 57" Overall Length, to use in the house but discovered it is far better in the garage.It is stiffer than the above broom and excels at jabbing it into corners, under benches, etc., and sweeping up small pieces of wood (golf ball size, from the bandsaw, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Perfect broom in many ways. Gets into those cracks in the outdoor bricks and pavements.. Sweeps up spent bird seed, fallen leaves, dirt and pea gravel. Broom is actually fun to use. I did have to return / exchange the first one as the paint on the handle was cracked. The paint on the second one was much better but not perfect, wondering if I will have to apply varnish or a second coat of paint at some time. Could be better quality there as I plan to keep and use this broom for a long time and don't want splinters. The broom is a bit heavy, am nearly 70, female, but I've quickly become used to it and it's now my favorite broom for those jobs were I can't use a flat push broom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Even carpenter bees think it’s a good broom
reviews.reviewText: The broom is great. Nice weight, heavy duty wooden handle. Amusingly, a couple local carpenter bees decided to make a nest inside the wooden broom handle! +1 star for doubling as a great home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Here is a broom that will finish the job...
reviews.reviewText: Although I had read some negative reviews regarding these brooms, I trusted the O-Cedar was still the quality that it has been for many, many years.When my two brooms arrived today, I quickly examined them. These are excellent, heavy duty straw brooms. They are quality construction, using excellent materials. The workmanship is very well done and the handle is more than adequate to facilitate any sweeping until the straw is completely worn out.Thank you, O-Cedar for continuing to offer excellence in your products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very heavy duty outdoor or garage brooms.
reviews.reviewText: Heavy duty was what I wanted and they are! I gifted these to my brother for Christmas. Great outdoor and garage brooms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Sweeping!
reviews.reviewText: I was very happy to get my 1st corn broom from O-Cedar. The broom did arrive with the black handle very poorly painted. Whatever machine was used to apply the paint, it did a very poor job. It looks like a tie-dyed item. I thought about returning it, but decided that I really needed it for my upcoming garage project and could not wait for a replacement. I do like the broom very much. It is a bit heavy, but very durable. I have since ordered one for my sister. There is nothing like a sturdy, corn broom for sweeping.
